channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [KAFKA-14938] Flaky test org.apache.kafka.connect.integration.ExactlyOnceSourceIntegrationTest#testConnectorBoundary
item.description:
Test seems to be failing with 

```
ava.lang.AssertionError: Not enough records produced by source connector. Expected at least: 100 + but got 72

Stacktrace

java.lang.AssertionError: Not enough records produced by source connector. Expected at least: 100 + but got 72
```

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
